entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:23 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.0°C

Temperature: 0.0°C

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
